column4: I am having problems with my sound card. Crimsun helped me, but sometimes I have sound on my laptop, but sometimes I don't...
Can someone help me?
I am having problems with my sound card. Crimsun helped me, but sometimes I have sound on my laptop, but sometimes I don't...
Can someone help me?
if crimusn couldn't fix it .. i doubt these buggers would be able to :-/
It did, but than he exited...
I think he couldn't finish...
... helping me
Right now I have sound
But the next time I start, maybe I won't
ok...
do you get system sounds?
Yes, right now I have everything
what about when you lose sound?
Nothing. It tells me that there is no sound device and to execute "esd" in a console
The sound icon has a red "X" over it
and you do so?
did you execute esd?
yes, and it tells me that there is no such directory (dev/dsp)

like i said ... pretty much no sound gurus in here except for crimsun... you can try this: http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/DebuggingSoundProblems/    but i'd keep droppign by in here to see if he's active
Thanks!
